statements: SELECT city, time, vehicle_count, avg_speed FROM traffic_data;
SELECT time, city, avg_speed, vehicle_count FROM traffic_data;
SELECT avg_speed, city, vehicle_count, time FROM traffic_data;
SELECT vehicle_count, avg_speed, city, time FROM traffic_data;
SELECT city, vehicle_count, avg_speed, time FROM traffic_data;
SELECT city, vehicle_count, avg_speed FROM traffic_data WHERE avg_speed > 50 ORDER BY city ASC
SELECT city, time FROM traffic_data WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT city, time, vehicle_count, avg_speed FROM traffic_data WHERE vehicle_count < 100 ORDER BY time ASC, avg_speed DESC
SELECT city, AVG(vehicle_count) AS avg_vehicle_count FROM traffic_data GROUP BY city HAVING AVG(vehicle_count) > 50 ORDER BY avg_vehicle_count DESC
SELECT city, MAX(avg_speed) AS max_speed FROM traffic_data GROUP BY city ORDER BY max_speed DESC
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT location, timestamp FROM traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM traffic_data WHERE location = 'Highway A';
SELECT * FROM traffic_analysis WHERE average_speed < 40;
SELECT analysis_id, traffic_congestion, average_speed, analysis_date FROM traffic_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY average_speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, timestamp, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE location LIKE 'City%' ORDER BY location
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM traffic_data
SELECT AVG(speed) AS average_speed, MAX(speed) AS max_speed, MIN(speed) AS min_speed FROM traffic_data
SELECT analysis_date, AVG(average_speed) AS avg_speed FROM traffic_analysis GROUP BY analysis_date ORDER BY avg_speed DESC
SELECT * FROM traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM traffic_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 1;
SELECT optimization_name, optimization_type FROM traffic_optimization WHERE implemented = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE location LIKE '%Highway%' ORDER BY speed ASC;
SELECT id, location, timestamp, speed FROM traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_name, description FROM traffic_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM traffic_optimization WHERE optimization_type = 'traffic flow' AND implemented = TRUE ORDER BY optimization_name ASC;
SELECT location, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 60 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT pattern_name, COUNT(*) AS total_patterns FROM traffic_patterns GROUP BY pattern_name HAVING total_patterns > 3 ORDER BY total_patterns DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras;
SELECT camera_id, location FROM traffic_cameras ORDER BY camera_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_sensors WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT type, location FROM traffic_sensors WHERE type = 'speed';
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns WHERE description LIKE '%traffic%';
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT location, status FROM traffic_sensors WHERE type = 'temperature';
SELECT incident_id, type, location FROM traffic_incidents WHERE type = 'accident' ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM traffic_patterns WHERE pattern_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras WHERE location LIKE '%highway%' AND status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM traffic_data;
SELECT id, speed, location FROM traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT road_name, speed_limit FROM road_segments WHERE speed_limit > 60 ORDER BY road_name ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result FROM traffic_analytics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE vehicle_id = 12345 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT road_name, speed_limit FROM road_segments INNER JOIN traffic_data ON road_segments.segment_id = traffic_data.vehicle_id WHERE traffic_data.speed > road_segments.speed_limit;

SELECT traffic_data.location, traffic_cameras.location AS camera_location, traffic_cameras.status FROM traffic_data INNER JOIN traffic_cameras ON traffic_data.location = traffic_cameras.location WHERE traffic_data.speed < 30 ORDER BY traffic_data.timestamp ASC;

SELECT traffic_data.timestamp, traffic_analytics.analysis_result FROM traffic_data LEFT JOIN traffic_analytics ON traffic_data.timestamp = traffic_analytics.timestamp WHERE traffic_analytics.analysis_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY traffic_data.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
